p.k: 74% Moving fantasy starring Kevin Costner as a Iowa farmer who, in answer to a mystical voice, turns his cornfield into a baseball pitch, with miraculous results
62% Feel-good comedy-drama starring Alex Lawther as a flamboyant, out-and-proud teen challenging the status quo at an ultra-conservative high school. With Abigail Breslin
74% Classic teen romance from Jerry Maguire director Cameron Crowe. A beautiful and brilliant high school student finds herself pursued by charming underachiever John Cusack
70% Classic romantic drama starring Richard Gere as a troubled trainee naval officer who falls for Debra Winger's sassy factory girl
76% Coming-of-age comedy starring Nick Robinson (Everything, Everything) as a closeted high-schooler who begins to fall for an anonymous classmate online. But who is he?
58% After her family moves to the picturesque Palos Verdes, teen outcast Maika Monroe battles to prove herself among the surfers on the California shore. With Jennifer Garner
78% Russell Crowe is the tobacco industry exec turned whistleblower, Al Pacino the newsman who persuades him to talk. Hard-hitting, heavyweight drama directed by Michael Mann
62% Woody Allen's 1950s-set drama stars Kate Winslet as a former actress whose life is upturned by the appearance of her husband's estranged daughter. With Juno Temple
76% Coming-of-age comedy starring Nick Robinson (Everything, Everything) as a closeted high-schooler who begins to fall for an anonymous classmate online. But who is he?
59% Tom Cruise stars as an ambitious barman who falls for a wealthy beauty, but risks everything to win a bet. Romantic drama with Elisabeth Shue
